subject: Physics
question_text: Given below are two statements: Statement (I) : Planck's constant and angular momentum have the same dimensions. Statement (II) : Linear momentum and moment of force have the same dimensions.

options.text: (1) Statement I is true but Statement II is false
(2) Both Statement I and Statement II are false
(3) Both Statement I and Statement II are true
(4) Statement I is false but Statement II is true
